Methods

(async) status(contentType, baseUrl) → {string}

Checking the service status
Parameters:
Name Type Default Description
contentType string json The type of data the API returns. Values: "json" or "xml"
baseUrl string https://api.infobip.com Infobip personal base URL
Source:
  • index.js, line 25
Returns:
String in JSON or XML
Type
string
Example
let infobip = require('node-infobip');
let status = await infobip.status();
console.log(status);
